name: 2024 IEEE International Conference on Image Processing
content: The 2024 IEEE International Conference on Image Processing (ICIP 2024) is renowned as the largest and most comprehensive conference dedicated to image & video processing and computer vision. ICIP 2024 promises to be a hub of innovation and learning. The technical program of the conference will feature eminent plenary speakers, insightful tutorials, engaging exhibits and demonstrations, oral and poster sessions, special sessions, industry-focused workshops, and several events targeting women-in-engineering, students, and young professionals.
